Package org.universAAL.ui.gui.swing.bluesteelLAF Description

Bluesteel Look and feel package, features a metal look with blue buttons. Highly visual efects like fade in, or collapsable system menu are achieved thanks to the swingx library. The look and feel packages need to contain a InitInterface class named Init, a FormLAF and a class LAF per each FormControl in the org.universAAL.ui.handler.gui.swing.model.FormControl package.
